message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $10,000. This is a high-quality item that I believe would greatly benefit you, given its value to you is estimated at $12,000. I look forward to your response.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, $10,000 is still a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet my asking price. However, I am unable to accept $9,000 for the product. I am willing to consider $9,500 as a compromise. I hope this aligns better with your budget.
